snippet: As protesters returned to the streets of Moscow on Wednesday, the Kremlin unveiled video of President Vladimir V. Putin speaking, in English, in support of the nation’s bid to host the 2020 World Expo.
abstract: As protesters returned to the streets of Moscow on Wednesday, the Kremlin unveiled video of President Vladimir V. Putin speaking, in English, in support of the nation’s bid to host the 2020 World Expo.

headline.main: As Putin Tries to Charm World Expo Voters, Protesters March Again in Moscow
